Class KeywordManager

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic

        public static boolean isKeyword(java.lang.String value)
        Checks whether the given string is a keyword.
        Parameters:

        Determines whether the given token is a keyword token.
        Parameters:
        token - token to be identified
        Returns:
        returns true if keyword, otherwise false
